## AVRO\_ADAPTER\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER variable

Provider for proper use of AvroAdapterInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AVRO_ADAPTER_INTERCEPTOR_PROVIDER: ClassProvider
```
